short_description: hypothesis test function to perform anova analysis on a data set.
long_description: fastpath function to perform one-way anova analysis on a data set with two or more groups.

input_tables.name: InputTable
input_tables.description: The relation that contains input data.
input_tables.rDescription: The relation that contains input data.

argument_clauses.name: GroupColumns
argument_clauses.description: Specifies the input table columns to use in the computation.
argument_clauses.rDescription: Specifies the input table columns to use in the computation.

argument_clauses.name: GroupNameColumn
argument_clauses.description: Specifies the input table column containing the names of the groups included in the ANOVA test. This argument is used when Input is in group-value format.
argument_clauses.rDescription: Specifies the input table column containing the names of the groups included in the ANOVA test. This argument is used when Input is in group-value format.

argument_clauses.name: GroupValueColumn
argument_clauses.description: Specifies the input table column containing the values for each group member. This argument is used when Input is in group-value format.
argument_clauses.rDescription: Specifies the input table column containing the values for each group member. This argument is used when Input is in group-value format.

argument_clauses.name: GroupNames
argument_clauses.description: Specifies the names of the groups included in the ANOVA test. This argument is used when Input is in group-value format.
argument_clauses.rDescription: Specifies the names of the groups included in the ANOVA test. This argument is used when Input is in group-value format.

argument_clauses.name: NumGroups
argument_clauses.description: Specifies the number of different groups in the input table included in the ANOVA test. This argument is used when Input is in group-value format.
argument_clauses.rDescription: Specifies the number of different groups in the input table included in the ANOVA test. This argument is used when Input is in group-value format.

argument_clauses.name: Alpha
argument_clauses.description: Specifies the value of alpha in hypothesis function
argument_clauses.rDescription: Specifies the value of alpha in hypothesis function
